original_title: オ○ンコ喉マ○コメッタ刺し ストーカー教師のこじらせ恋愛の餌食になった無垢美少女 横宮七海
overview: Yoshino, the perverted homeroom teacher has a crush on Yokonomiya, a pretty student girl.  He arranges a pretended rape against her, to win her heart by protecting her. But after her cold responses, he gets triggered and the raping becomes real.
title: Innocent Beautiful Girl With A Crush Falls Prey To Her Stalker Teacher: Her Mouth And Pussy Stuffed Full Of Cock Nanami Yokomiya
